mapper.select: SELECT a.ADMIN_ID AS adminId , a.ADMIN_NAME AS adminName , a.PART_ID AS partId , a.ADMIN_PASSWORD AS adminPassword , b.PART_NM AS partNm , a.ADMIN_EMAIL AS adminEmail , a.ADMIN_TEL AS adminTel , a.ADMIN_LEVEL AS adminLevel , TO_CHAR( ADD_MONTHS(a.UPDATE_PASSWORD, 2),'yyyyMMdd') updatePassword FROM TB_MANAGERINFO a, TB_PARTINFO b WHERE ADMIN_ID = #{adminId} AND a.PART_ID = b.PART_ID AND ADMIN_PASSWORD = #{adminPassword} AND LOCK_YN = 'N' AND USE_YN = 'Y'
